item.title: 3 Good Practices of Hardward CAD Framework
item.description: In IC (Integrated Circuit) industry, CAD is a function to make hardware designer’s life easy. This is how I define CAD in hardware design. “Easy” contains different meanings. Easy to understand the inputs Easy to use the functions Easy to check the result (Accurate and reliable) A lot of people always like to use Apple products as an example. Here I am. Apple has suitable technologies but not the most advanced technology.

item.title: What is "Communication Plan"
item.description:
In the “Project Management” Course, one of the topics is “Communication Plan”.

When the phrase “communication plan” is used, I feel it is pretty clear what should I do to sell the product and have better connection with the users, and among the developers.

Communication plans can help you clarify the purpose of a product launch or new initiative and officially determine the messages you want to deliver to your intended audience(s).

item.title: Project Management Notes
item.description: Recently, I enrolled the Project Management course in Coursera. The course is delivered by Google. I found this is interesting, because usually we have some basic knowledge how to manage a small team, and how to manage a simple project. For example, plan a trip, upgrade the gararge, etc. After going through the first course, I found this course can really help to correct my mindset and change the way how to communicate with other people.
